snippet: Joshua Komisarjevsky, a co-defendant in a gruesome Cheshire, Conn., home invasion in 2007, will be sentenced either to death or to life in prison.
lead_paragraph: Joshua Komisarjevsky, a co-defendant in a gruesome Cheshire, Conn., home invasion in 2007, will be sentenced either to death or to life in prison.

headline.main: Second Defendant Is Convicted in Connecticut Triple Murder
headline.print_headline: Second Defendant Convicted in Cheshire Triple Murder
headline.seo: Komisarjevsky Convicted of Triple Murder in Cheshire, Conn.
